评论详情: This product is very well made and of excellent quality. I was very happy and surprised that what I received was exactly what was pictured and what I was expecting. The super soft but sturdy rope belt is as thick as what they advertise which is exactly what I needed for a rope belt for my ancient Druid costume for Halloween. I am overweight with a 45" waist so I purchased two of these badboys and tied them together to make it twice as long so I can wrap it around me three times and still have about 6 or 7 inches of rope to hang down like tassels. I also purchased a resin wolf skull on Amazon and I am threading this rope through the eye sockets to wear as a cool looking codpiece. I love this product and I am a very happy customer. I would highly recommend this product to anyone interested.

评论概述: Not much to it. Great in it's simplicity.
评论详情: Used for an outfit. It's simple... but it's quality. Good materials and has gone through some use with no issues.
Immediately feel apart in the washing machine.  Didn't see any warning about washing it.

I bought this as a bathrobe belt and it's super. The texture makes it easy to bind to each other and so does not unravel. All other bathrobe belts are made of slippery fabrics that unfold easily. Also this belt is great looking and feeling as well.  You'll never find a better belt or a better looking one.

Unexpectedly soft! I was worried it would start to unravel or fray easily, especially with frequent use as part of a Ren Fair costume worn for 8 hour days in the sun. Turned out not to be a problem! And the ends are bound with glue or thread, not knotted, so you don’t have clunky knots on the ends to get in the way. But also there’s still fringe on the ends to make it look authentic. Stayed in place all day as a belt with my robe in a Ren Fest costume, and wasn’t too tick to string my pouches and accessories onto.

评论概述: Exactly what I was looking for
评论详情: Awesome rope belt. Time will tell how it holds up but I’m very happy with it.
I use this to replace my traditional belt and buckle.  I love it!  it looks all cool and martial-artsy.  I get teased by my friends about it but they're coming around
Super soft and works great for my fiance's pirate costume.

评论概述: Not too heavy, not to light, my new belt.
评论详情: Nice weight to it, not too light not too heavy, balanced... Thanos would be proud. It can wrap around my body twice and be tied in a small knot or once and have alot of slack, which is what I wanted, amazing product, and thank you.
Used it on a large robe for Halloween and it worked great. Good weight and feel to it.

For a rope belt, I have to say it's excellent quality. Very smooth to touch and strong enough to be tied in various knots. Pretty thick and plenty of length for nice knots. Would recommend amongst over other Rope belts.
Great quality, very soft, and nice length! It exceeded all my expectations and I can't wait to order more of your products!

I bought this belt for use in one festival outfit, but have since paired it with multiple everyday looks. It's a great weight, hefty while not being cumbersome, and seems well secured so I doubt it will unravel under regular wear.
I like the lightness of it. I can also use it in many styles with different knots. Definitely am happy with it.
It's a good product condition.  High quality as expected
